text: The 1540s BC was a decade lasting from January 1, 1549 BC to December 31, 1540 BC. ==Events and trends== * History of ancient Israel and Judah—earliest date for Ahmose I founding the Eighteenth dynasty of Egypt. ==Significant people== * 1545 BC—Ahmose I, Pharaoh and founder of the 18th Dynasty of Egypt, dies, according to the High Chronology.
title: 1540s BC
